function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased reliance on smart wireless devices in urban areas","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of germicidal scores in flexibility and storage criteria","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Spread of hospital acquired infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient preparation for future pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wearables for early detection of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to comprehensive information due to language and search engine restrictions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Temporary
